error_analysis.query:
fields @timestamp, @message, correlation_id, service
| filter level = "ERROR"
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100
error_analysis.description: Find all errors with correlation IDs

request_tracing.query:
fields @timestamp, @message, correlation_id, method, url
| filter ispresent(correlation_id)
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50

governance_decisions.query:
fields @timestamp, service, intent, allowed, reason, correlation_id
| filter ispresent(allowed)
| stats count() by bin(5m), allowed
| sort @timestamp desc

performance_analysis.query:
fields @timestamp, duration, service, operation
| filter ispresent(duration)
| stats avg(duration), max(duration), min(duration) by bin(1m), service
| sort @timestamp desc

security_events.query:
fields @timestamp, @message, source_ip, user_agent
| filter @message like /DENIED/ or @message like /BLOCKED/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 50
